item.title: Bunny
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: See if it works for this 3D plot after we enable the hook via the chunk option webgl = TRUE: #x <- sort(rnorm(1000)) #y <- rnorm(1000) #z <- rnorm(1000) + atan2(x,y) #plot3d(x, y, z, col = rainbow(1000)) obj <- rgl::readOBJ("bunny.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
